name: Echoes: The Hollow Imprint Conceptual Demo
name_original: Echoes: The Hollow Imprint Conceptual Demo
description:
Echoes: The Hollow Imprint, seeks to deliver entertainment in a similar way that Limbo do. Where you need to discern the elements of the enviroment, avoid dangers and solve puzles.

In this game you'll be impersonating Cubito (a geometric who suffers amnesia), in a cartoonish post-apocalyptic world that it's dealing with an Unkown Being, and his heralds of destruction: the apocalipse rabbits. Help Cubito to find someone who spends with him the end of the world, while recovering his memories and unraveling the story behind the world destruction.

---------------------------------------------------------------

This is a conceptual demo, that which we're testing. We want to see how the game fares with you all and what your feedback says about it. We're looking forward this project completition so please leave us your feedback (check the surveys links down below)

You can play with either your keyboard or Xbox controller. If you have one, we highly recommend to play with it, if you don't you can use x360ce (follow website's instructions) to simulate one on your joystick.

Once you tried the demo, please fill the following survey:

  • English survey.
  • Encuesta en español.

As said above, we're mostly searching for your feedback on the project. As such we created this conceptual demo that currently contains one level, but as time goes and feedback comes we'll end up having three levels, at which point we all are going to determine the project's continuation.

*Remember to check Echoes: The Hollow Imprint website (you will find more lore in here)! We'll be also posting news on development on our twitter and facebook, so check those out as well :3
